mica2-accel.h File Reference

Integrated accelermoter sensor for the mica2. More...

#include "mos.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Detailed Description

Integrated accelermoter sensor for the mica2.

The driver registers with the dev layer as two different devs, but they are intertwined in hardware so we implement it in one file.
